text: Wolfgang Suschitzky, BSC (29 August 1912 - 7 October 2016), was an Austrian photographer and cinematographer. He was best known for his works with Paul Rotha in the 1940s and his work on Mike Hodges' 1971 movie Get Carter. He was born in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Compilation website of Suschitzky's photos * Wolf Suschitsky photographs at Lumiere Gallery *BAFTA tribute to Suschitzky Category:1912 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Centenarians Category:Cinematographers Category:People from Vienna Category:Photographers
title: Wolfgang Suschitzky
